titles.title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 3-amino-2'(sulfato-ethyl sulfonyl) ethyl benzamide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/26/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 3-amino-2'(sulfato-ethyl sulfonyl) ethyl benzamide.
